name: Java Utility Classes by Attila Kovacs
short_description:
A set of utility classes to aid scientific computing in Java, with a particular focus on astronomical applications. (After all, these utilities have spun out of the CRUSH data reduction development...)
The aim is to provide well-constructed and fast Java classes for scientific computing. You could call it a "Numerical Recipes for Java" but hopefully more elegant and intuitive, and ultimately with a broader scope. Did I mention fast?
The utilities also rely on the nom.tam.fits utilities for handling FITS files.
For now, the project is barely off to a start, with almost no documentation. The source code is also expected to evolve substantially in the short term. Thus, for the time being, it is not recommended for general use, except for the suicidally adventurous.
Comments and suggestions are always welcome...
summary: Numerical, astronomical, and miscellaneous utility classes for Java
